SENT.plain: The article deals with the results of a prospective (3.8 year long) study of a nonorganized male population (40-59 years of age) in one of Moscow districts
Total blood plasma cholesterol, triglycerides, and HDL cholesterol were determined in 3663 men
The results of the study show that to assess the risk of death from atherosclerosis, coefficient of total cholesterol fractions ratio should be taken into account
